original_text: All the officers of the priests and the people likewise were exceedingly unfaithful, following all the abominations of the nations. And they polluted the house of the Lord that he had made holy in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 모든 제사장들의 우두머리들과 백성도 크게 범죄하여 이방 모든 가증한 일을 따라서 여호와께서 예루살렘에 거룩하게 두신 그의 전을 더럽게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: All the officers of the priests and the people likewise
following all the abominations of the nations.
sentences.korean_translation: 이방 모든 민족의 가증한 일을 따랐습니다.

sentences.original_text: And they polluted the house of the Lord
that he had made holy in Jerusalem.
